text: Igor Fyodorovich Maslennikov (; 26 October 1931 â€“ 17 September 2022) was a Soviet and Russian movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Nizhny Novgorod, Soviet Union. His career lasted between 1967 to 2002. He directed the movies Under en steinhimmel, Winter Cherry, The Queen of Spades and Tomorrow, on April 3rd.... In 2001 he was a member of the jury at the 23rd Moscow International Film Festival. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Soviet screenwriters Category:Russian screenwriters Category:Russian movie directors Category:People from Nizhny Novgorod
title: Igor Maslennikov
